property.name: value
property.label: Value
property.description: The selected value(Output). This can be passed into QuickChoice, allowing you to set the default value dynamically(Input).

property.name: selectedLabel
property.label: Selected Label
property.description: The selected Label (V1.3+)

property.name: allValues
property.label: All Values
property.description: The complete set of values provided to the user. (V1.3+)

property.name: allLabels
property.label: All Labels
property.description: The complete set of labels provided to the user (V1.3+)

property.name: choiceValues
property.label: Choice Values (String Collection)
property.description: The values of your choices (should be unique) - The selected Value will be returned by the component - Extra descriptive text on visual cards

property.name: choiceLabels
property.label: Choice Labels (String Collection)
property.description: The labels of your choices

property.name: choiceIcons
property.label: Card Mode - Choice Icons (String Collection)
property.description: Icon names or image names

property.name: includeIcons
property.label: Card Mode - Include Icons in Display Box?
property.description: Display the provided icons in the visual card when set to True

property.name: navOnSelect
property.label: Button Mode
property.description: Navigate to next flow element on card selection

property.name: iconSize
property.label: Card Mode - Icon Size
property.description: Options include x-small, small, medium, or large. This value defaults to medium.

property.name: numberOfColumns
property.label: Card Mode - Number of Display Box Columns (1 or 2)
property.description: 1 or blank (default) for a single column or 2 for dual columns

property.name: inputMode
property.label: Input Mode
property.description: “Single String Collection”, “Dual String Collections”, “Picklist Field”, or ” Visual Text Box ” are currently supported

property.name: masterLabel
property.label: Master Label
property.description: The main label for the picklist or radio button group

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: Will prevent transition if set to {!$GlobalConstant.True}

property.name: displayMode
property.label: Display Mode
property.description: Either “Visual”, “Picklist” or “Radio”, depending on which control you want

property.name: recordTypeId
property.label: Record Type Id
property.description: Record Type Id (for Picklist Field)

property.name: objectName
property.label: Object Name
property.description: Object Name (for Picklist Field)

property.name: fieldName
property.label: Field Name
property.description: Field Name (for Picklist Field)

property.name: allowNoneToBeChosen
property.label: Allow 'None' to be Chosen
property.description: Set this to true to include a None choice. (For Input Mode “Picklist Field” only)

property.name: style_width
property.label: Set Width in Pixels
property.description: Set the width of the component for Picklist and Radio Buttons (Default 320 pixels)

property.name: sortList
property.label: Sort the Picklist by Label?
property.description: Set this to true to sort the list of Picklist labels. Default will the the order they were added.
